name: Zombie Crusher (Sab)
description:
You are a survivor in a city full of zombies, kill them to survive. As we all know the weakness of zombie is their head, so go for the head.

Controls are simple move with arrow or A,S,W,D keys, jump with Space bar, look around with mouse, shoot with left mouse button, change weapon with mouse scroll, to run hold/press left shift while moving.
